page.title: 10Attitudes re The Maylands
page.content: Mayland is the old village with Maylandsea as a riverside development. The newcomers in Maylandsea are predominantly Londoners who have made some money and want to live in the country,but who want urban amenities e.g. made up roads and street lights. The established residentd who mainly live in Mayland are slower to adopt new standards. There is resentment of anything that will take them away from family and leisure at weekends. General apathy towards church going but Church needed for ceremonial occasions. Houses seen as a status symbol. No room for children to play indoors, they are encouraged to go outside. The housing is mostly well maintained private housing. Preservation of salt marsh instigated by residents.
